errors.length-number-and-required: Length is a required numeric field
errors.length-out-of-sync-with-geometry: The distance entered is too far from the geometry (Must be between {{min}} and {{max}})
errors.no-infra-available: Your account is not linked to any infrastructure

duplicated_group.name: Duplicated switch pattern
duplicated_group.description: Switch type « {{obj_id}} » contains a duplicate configuration « {{original_group_path}} »

invalid_group.name: Position de l'aiguille invalide
invalid_group.description: The switch « {{obj_id}} » of the route « {{group}} » is in the configuration « {{switch_type}} » which does not exist

invalid_reference.name: Invalid reference
invalid_reference.description: The object « {{obj_id}} » references the object « {{reference.obj_id}} » which does not exist

invalid_route.name: Invalid route
invalid_route.description: Route « {{obj_id}} » is invalid, requested path is not consistent

invalid_switch_ports.name: Invalid switch pattern
invalid_switch_ports.description: Switch « {{obj_id}} » has a branch which is not compatible with its type

missing_buffer_stop.name: Missing buffer stop
missing_buffer_stop.description: Endpoint « {{endpoint}} » of track « {{obj_id}} » has no buffer stop

object_out_of_path.name: Object out of path
object_out_of_path.description: Object « {{obj_id}} » of track « {{reference.obj_id}} » is not contained in the corresponding path

odd_buffer_stop_location.name: Strange buffer stop position
odd_buffer_stop_location.description: Buffer stop « {{obj_id}} » has a strange position

out_of_range.name: Invalid value
out_of_range.description: Object « {{obj_id}} » has the field « {{field}} » with an invalid value. Value must be in the following range {{expected_range}}.

overlapping_switches.name: Overlapping of switches
overlapping_switches.description: Switches « {{obj_id}} » and « {{reference.obj_id}} » have the same extremeties

unknown_port_name.name: Unknown branch name
unknown_port_name.description: Switch « {{obj_id}} » has the branch « {{port_name}} » which does not exist

unused_port.name: Unused branch
unused_port.description: Branch « {{port_name}} » of switch type « {{obj_id}} » is nerver used

node_endpoints_not_unique.name: Node endpoints not unique
node_endpoints_not_unique.description: The « {{obj_id}} » node has a track endpoint used by several ports.

list.error: An error occurred while loading the data
list.goto-error: Select and locate on the map

corrector-modal.title: Automatic error corrector
corrector-modal.text: The following actions will be applied to correct some of the infrastructure's errors:

linear-metadata.help: This component allows you to view and modify a linear layout. You can zoom into the view using the provided buttons or the mouse wheel, and move around using drag'n'drop. To change the size of a segment, simply click on it and the edit form will be displayed below. You can also click on a border of a segment, and while keeping your finger pressed, move the border with the mouse.

nav.infra-changed: You are now editing the infra "{{label}}" (id "{{id}}").
nav.infra-errors: Display current infrastructure issues on the map
nav.toggle-layers: Choose the types of elements to display
